location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage and the signature and the date of the letter have been partially obscured. However, the author of the letter can still be clearly identified.

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a communication (not present) for Mr Jukes.The dates of the surrounding correspondence suggests that the date of this letter lies between 8-13 February 1808.
